Package com.intellij.openapi.externalSystem.service.internal

Class ExternalSystemProcessingManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.externalSystem.service.internal.ExternalSystemProcessingManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, ExternalSystemTaskNotificationListener

    public final class ExternalSystemProcessingManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExternalSystemTaskNotificationListener, Disposable
    Provides external system tasks monitoring and management facilities.

    Thread-safe.

      • beforeCancel

        public void beforeCancel(ExternalSystemTaskId id)
        Description copied from interface: ExternalSystemTaskNotificationListener
        Notifies that task with the given id is queued for the cancellation.

        'Queued' here means that intellij process-local codebase receives request to cancel the target task and even has not been sent it to the slave gradle api process.

        Specified by:
        beforeCancel in interface ExternalSystemTaskNotificationListener
        Parameters:
        id - target task's id
